definitions.name: Tiny Wall Panel - Custom
definitions.description:
A 1 by 1 block panel that will display the texture you want using an URL!
Recommended texture ratio: 1:1

definitions.name: Small Wall Panel - Custom
definitions.description:
A 1 by 3 block panel that will display the texture you want using an URL!
Recommended texture ratio: 1:4, with the texture itself spread on 1:3, centered on left

definitions.name: Normal Wall Panel - Custom
definitions.description:
A 1.5 by 4.5 block panel that will display the texture you want using an URL!
Recommended texture ratio: 1:4, with the texture itself spread on 1:3, centered on left

definitions.name: Large Wall Panel - Custom
definitions.description:
A 2 by 6 block panel that will display the texture you want using an URL!
Recommended texture ratio: 1:4, with the texture itself spread on 1:3, centered on left
